mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, views, likes, photo, regdate, updatedate, pettype, user_no from pet_board
mapper.insert: insert into pet_board(bno, title, content, writer, photo, pettype, user_no) values (seq_pet_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{photo}, #{pettype}, #{user_no})
insert into pet_board_heart(hno, bno, user_no) values (seq_pet_board_heart.nextval, #{bno}, #{user_no})
mapper.delete: delete from pet_board_heart where bno=#{bno} and user_no=#{user_no}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, views, likes, photo, regdate, updatedate, pettype, user_no from pet_board where (title like '%' || #{content} || '%' or content like '%' || #{content} || '%' or writer like '%' || #{content} || '%')
